channel.title: Events on The Agile Kaleidoscope
channel.description: Recent content in Events on The Agile Kaleidoscope

item.title: An incomplete report from the Agile Tour Zurich
item.description: Last weekend, I was in Zürich for the very first edition of the Agile Tour Zürich. Let me share with you an incomplete report of what happened there. One could say that there are plenty of Agile Tour in France, so why go to Switzerland to attend and to speak at one, right? Let’s be honest. I was in the city this August for Agile Lean Europe 2018 and I did not fell in love with it.
